description.title: The game
description.subtitle: Will you remember 2 digits ago?
description.p1: Every turn the game will show you one digit.
description.p2: First two turns just remember the digits.
description.p3: Then, the game will ask you if a digit was displayed two turns ago!

list.l3: Turn 3 : you remember 8. The game asks you if 5 was displayed two turns ago: no.
list.l4: Turn 4 : you remember 1. The game asks you if 7 was displayed two turns ago: yes.

description.score: Go as far as you can, make the biggest score!

p.1: This project is inspired by the psychotechnical tests to be performed to become a pilot at Air France.
p.2: The fabulous site <1>Pilotest</1> has developed excellent tests of this nature, must see!
p.3: This game uses these technologies: React.js, TypeScript, Reach Router, Shards React, react-i18next.

inGame.question: Was this digit displayed two turns ago?
